General.Name: EZMarket
General.Description:
EZMarket is a decentralized application built on the Ethereum blockchain. It has no centralized authority and it does not require a middleman to function or to manage user’s information.

Smart contracts are the bridge on the blockchain to connect buyers and sellers. Transactions are completed in a trustless manner and automatically.

ICO.Description:
EZMarket is a decentralized application built on the Ethereum blockchain. It has no centralized authority and it does not require a middleman to function or to manage user’s information.

Smart contracts are the bridge on the blockchain to connect buyers and sellers. Transactions are completed in a trustless manner and automatically.

Team:

  • Yann Le Gentil: Founder & CTO.
  • Peter Arnoldi: Advisor.
  • Subodh Kaushik: Manager.
  • Ballard Pham: Developer.
  • Leonid Yeromin: Developer.
  • Alyona Matakova: Developer.

EZMarket will be holding its ICO on October 14, 2017. The ICO token supply represents 76% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 114,000,000 tokens available, for 0.001 each at the offering. The ICO is expected to end on November 25, 2017.

Token Reserve Split (24%):

  • 20% Company;
  • 04% Bounty Program;

Bonus Structure:

  • Week 1 +30%;
  • Week 2 +25%;
  • Week 3 +20%;
  • Week 4 +15%
  • After Week 5 No bonus
